Name: Love Chan
About the game: 'Love Chan' is a touchable desktop pet, Can be placed anywhere on your computer desktop, The left mouse button can drag the character, the right mouse button can open the function menu, free to change ! Note: Open the function menu, open the attack, turn on the touch three functions, you need to use the left mouse button function, Unable to click on other apps on the desktop, Turn off these three functions to recover Game features Sexy character design Dynamic character Multiple characters Multiple poses Can attack character Can touch character Can adjust the touch range Free movement Free zoom Powerful background rejection technology
